text: Bosor () was an ancient Biblical Levitical city and one of the three Trans- Jordanian Cities of Refuge named in the Mosaic Law. It was located in Gilead, and was conquered by Judas Maccabeus. 1 Maccabees 5:26, 36 It is sometimes identified with modern-day Busra al-Harir. Josephus commented on its conquest. ==References== ==External links== *Jewish Encyclopedia article Category:Levitical cities
title: Bosor
